item.description: This is a beautiful destination.  A long day for sure, but well worth it!  Meet at the Mobil Station in Hopkinton (exit 21A off of 495, Mobil will be on your left), 8:30 am, leave at 9:00. It's a level 3 due to it being a long day, and due to a little bit of highway. It's about 300 miles round trip from the Mobil station. Once we're up in Quechee, we'll pick up sandwiches at Subway & bring them to the gorge for a picnic/exploration.  Be sure to wear comfortable footwear.  It will be a long day, returning early to mid evening.
item.name: Queechee Gorge, Vt (Level 3)
